column4: I stated a question in #xubuntu but didn't receive much input so I repeat it in here. Hopefully some experts in here can help me with it...

A general question about sysv-rc-conf". It's more or less for usage with Red Hat systems but also widely used on Debian/Ubuntu. What do you think about it (also in comparison with BUM and the default XFCE service control)?"
umm can you bring those to offtopic
I don't know "where" offtopic is, but I have a general Problem with administrating my services on my Ubuntu server and Xubuntu clients. This is a support request.
